option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Hướng dẫn Development - EV Battery Swap Station MS
## Kiến trúc 5 Service chính
| Service | Port IDE | Port Docker | Database Port | Chức năng | |---------|----------|-------------|---------------|-----------| | **Eureka Server** | 8762 | 8761 | - | Service Discovery | | **API Gateway** | 8080 | 9000 | - | API Gateway, Routing | | **Auth-User** | 8081 | 9001 | 5433 | Xác thực, Profile, Phân quyền | | **Station** | 8082 | 9002 | 5434 | Quản lý trạm, Pin, Geo | | **Booking** | 8083 | 9003 | 5435 | Đặt lịch, Đổi pin, Notification | | **Billing** | 8084 | 9004 | 5436 | Thanh toán, Báo cáo, Analytics |
---
## ️ Setup cho Development
### 1. Khởi động Infrastructure (chỉ cần chạy 1 lần)
```cmd docker-compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d ```
**Infrastructure bao gồm:** - ✅ Eureka Server (port 8761) - ✅ 4 PostgreSQL databases - ✅ Kafka + Zookeeper - ✅ MailHog (SMTP testing)
**Kiểm tra trạng thái:** ```cmd docker-compose -f docker-compose.base.yml ps ```
### 2. Chạy Service trong IDE (IntelliJ IDEA)
#### Option A: Sử dụng Eureka từ Docker (Khuyến nghị ⭐)
Chỉ cần chạy service của bạn trong IDE, nó sẽ tự động kết nối đến Eureka trong Docker (port 8761).
**Ví dụ: Chạy Auth-User Service** 1. Mở class `AuthUserApplication.java` 2. Click nút Run 3. Service sẽ chạy trên port `8081` và register với Eureka tại `localhost:8761`
#### Option B: Chạy Eureka trong IDE (nếu cần debug Eureka)
**Bước 1:** Stop Eureka trong Docker ```cmd docker stop base-eureka-server ```
**Bước 2:** Chạy Eureka trong IDE với profile `ide` - Mở `EurekaServerApplication.java` - Edit Configuration → VM options: `-Dspring.profiles.active=ide` - Run → Eureka sẽ chạy trên port `8762`
**Bước 3:** Cập nhật biến môi trường cho các service khác: ``` EUREKA_CLIENT_SERVICEURL_DEFAULTZONE=http://localhost:8762/eureka/ ```
---
## Test và Debug
### Chạy từng service:
```cmd # Chỉ chạy service bạn đang phát triển # Ví dụ: Auth-User Service cd auth-user ./mvnw spring-boot:run
# Hoặc trong IDE: Run AuthUserApplication.java ```
### Access URLs:
- **Eureka Dashboard (Docker):** http://localhost:8761 - **Eureka Dashboard (IDE):** http://localhost:8762 - **MailHog UI:** http://localhost:8025 - **API Gateway:** http://localhost:8080 - **Auth Service:** http://localhost:8081 - **Station Service:** http://localhost:8082 - **Booking Service:** http://localhost:8083 - **Billing Service:** http://localhost:8084
---
## Deploy Full System với Docker
```cmd # Build tất cả services ./build-all.bat # Windows ./build-all.sh # Linux/Mac
# Chạy toàn bộ hệ thống docker-compose up -d
# Kiểm tra logs docker-compose logs -f [service-name]
# Stop toàn bộ docker-compose down ```
---
## Troubleshooting
### Lỗi: Port already in use
**Nguyên nhân:** Service đang chạy trong Docker conflict với IDE
**Giải pháp:** ```cmd # Stop service đang chạy trong Docker docker stop [container-name]
# Hoặc stop toàn bộ docker-compose down ```
### Lỗi: Cannot connect to Database
**Kiểm tra database đang chạy:** ```cmd docker-compose -f docker-compose.base.yml ps ```
**Restart database:** ```cmd docker-compose -f docker-compose.base.yml restart [db-name] ```
### Lỗi: Service không register với Eureka
**Kiểm tra:** 1. Eureka Server có đang chạy? → http://localhost:8761 2. Biến môi trường `EUREKA_CLIENT_SERVICEURL_DEFAULTZONE` có đúng không? 3. Network có kết nối được không?
---
## Development Workflow
### Workflow A: Chạy tất cả trong Docker ```cmd docker-compose up -d # Phù hợp cho: Test integration, Demo ```
### Workflow B: Development với IDE (Khuyến nghị) ```cmd # 1. Chạy infrastructure docker-compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d
# 2. Chạy service của bạn trong IDE # - Build nhanh # - Debug dễ dàng # - Hot reload
# 3. Test với Postman/curl curl http://localhost:8081/api/users ```
### Workflow C: Hybrid (một số service Docker, một số IDE) ```cmd # 1. Chạy infrastructure docker-compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d
# 2. Chạy các service khác trong Docker docker-compose up -d auth-user station booking
# 3. Chỉ chạy service đang phát triển trong IDE (ví dụ: billing) # Run BillingApplication.java trong IDE ```
---
## Clean Up
```cmd # Stop và xóa containers docker-compose down
# Stop và xóa containers + volumes (xóa data) docker-compose down -v
# Xóa tất cả images docker rmi $(docker images -q "be_evbssms*")
# Clean build artifacts ./mvnw clean # trong từng service folder ```
---
## Tài liệu tham khảo
- [Spring Boot Documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-boot/docs/current/reference/html/) - [Spring Cloud Netflix](https://spring.io/projects/spring-cloud-netflix) - [Docker Compose](https://docs.docker.com/compose/)

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Hướng dẫn khởi động Swagger UI qua Gateway (Port 8080)
## ✅ Cấu hình hiện tại (đã setup sẵn)
### Gateway Routes: - Auth-User Swagger: `http://localhost:8080/auth-user/swagger-ui.html` - Station Swagger: `http://localhost:8080/station/swagger-ui.html` - Booking Swagger: `http://localhost:8080/booking/swagger-ui.html` - Billing Swagger: `http://localhost:8080/billing/swagger-ui.html`
### Cơ chế hoạt động: 1. Gateway nhận request: `/auth-user/swagger-ui.html` 2. StripPrefix filter loại bỏ `/auth-user` 3. Forward đến auth-user service: `/swagger-ui.html` 4. Service trả về Swagger UI ✅
## Các bước khởi động (QUAN TRỌNG)
### Bước 1: Khởi động Eureka Server ```bash cd eureka-server mvn spring-boot:run ``` Đợi xuất hiện: `Started Eureka Server`
### Bước 2: Khởi động Auth-User Service ```bash cd auth-user mvn spring-boot:run ``` Đợi xuất hiện: `Started AuthUserApplication`
### Bước 3: Kiểm tra Eureka Dashboard - Mở: http://localhost:8761 - Xác nhận `AUTH-USER` xuất hiện trong "Instances currently registered with Eureka"
### Bước 4: Khởi động API Gateway ```bash cd api-gateway mvn spring-boot:run ``` Đợi xuất hiện: `Started GatewayApplication`
### Bước 5: Test Swagger UI ```bash # Test service trực tiếp (phải hoạt động) http://localhost:8081/swagger-ui/index.html
# Test qua gateway http://localhost:8080/auth-user/swagger-ui.html ```
## Troubleshooting
### Lỗi 404: No static resource swagger-ui/index.html
**Nguyên nhân:** - Service chưa khởi động - Service chưa đăng ký với Eureka - Gateway chưa fetch registry từ Eureka
**Giải pháp:** 1. Restart tất cả services theo đúng thứ tự trên 2. Đợi 30 giây sau mỗi lần start service 3. Xóa cache browser (Ctrl+Shift+Delete) 4. Test lại
### Kiểm tra logs
**Gateway logs:** ``` # Nên thấy: - "Mapped [GET] [/auth-user/swagger-ui.html]" - "Route matched: auth-user-swagger-ui" ```
**Auth-user logs:** ``` # Nên thấy: - "DiscoveryClient registered with Eureka" - "Fetched config from server at http://localhost:8761/eureka/" ```
## Nếu vẫn lỗi - Dùng URL trực tiếp
Sửa tạm thời gateway config (file: `api-gateway/src/main/resources/application.yml`):
```yaml # Auth-User Swagger - DÙNG URL TRỰC TIẾP - id: auth-user-swagger-ui uri: http://localhost:8081 # Thay vì lb://auth-user predicates: - Path=/auth-user/swagger-ui.html,/auth-user/swagger-ui/**,/auth-user/v3/api-docs/**,/auth-user/webjars/** filters: - StripPrefix=1 ```
Sau đó restart gateway và test lại.
## Ghi chú
- Service độc lập vẫn hoạt động bình thường: `http://localhost:8081/swagger-ui/index.html` - Gateway chỉ là proxy, route requests đến service - StripPrefix=1 loại bỏ segment đầu tiên (/auth-user) trước khi forward

option.name: originalContent
option.value: FROM eclipse-temurin:21-jre WORKDIR /app COPY ./target/code-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar app.jar EXPOSE 8080 ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","/app/app.jar"]

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.5.6</version> <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> </parent> <groupId>com.boilerplate</groupId> <artifactId>code</artifactId> <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <name>code</name> <description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description> <url/> <licenses> <license/> </licenses> <developers> <developer/> </developers> <scm> <connection/> <developerConnection/> <tag/> <url/> </scm> <properties> <java.version>21</java.version> </properties> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId> </dependency> <!-- Validation --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Actuator --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springdoc/springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId> <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifactId> <version>2.8.13</version> </dependency>
<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.flywaydb/flyway-core --> <dependency> <groupId>org.flywaydb</groupId> <artifactId>flyway-core</artifactId> <version>11.10.0</version> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.flywaydb</groupId> <artifactId>flyway-database-postgresql</artifactId> <version>11.10.0</version> </dependency>
<!-- Resource Server cho JWT --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Test --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <!-- Testcontainers (tùy chọn) --> <!-- <dependency> <groupId>org.testcontainers</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> -->
<!-- Configuration metadata (IDE hints) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-configuration-processor</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-security</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-docker-compose</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.security</groupId> <artifactId>spring-security-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <annotationProcessorPaths> <path> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </path> </annotationProcessorPaths> </configuration> </plugin> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <excludes> <exclude> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: analytics: build: context: ./analytics command: ["java", "-jar", "/app/app.jar"] ports: - "9007:8080" env_file: - .env depends_on: - analytics-db - eureka-server networks: [evnet] environment: analytics-db: image: postgres:16-alpine environment: - POSTGRES_DB=analyticsdb - POSTGRES_USER=ev - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=evpass ports: - "5439:5432" networks: [evnet]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
version: "3.8" services: analytics: build: context: ./analytics command: ["java", "-jar", "/app/app.jar"] ports: - "9007:8080" env_file: - .env depends_on: - analytics-db - eureka-server networks: - evnet
analytics-db: image: postgres:16-alpine environment: - POSTGRES_DB=analyticsdb - POSTGRES_USER=ev - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=evpass ports: - "5439:5432" networks: - evnet
eureka-server: image: eurekaserver:latest ports: - "8761:8761" networks: - evnet
networks: evnet: driver: bridge

<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-security</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-docker-compose</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.security</groupId> <artifactId>spring-security-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <annotationProcessorPaths> <path> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </path> </annotationProcessorPaths> </configuration> </plugin> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <excludes> <exclude> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Hướng dẫn khắc phục lỗi "chk_status constraint"
## ❌ Vấn đề ``` ERROR: new row for relation "users" violates check constraint "chk_status" Detail: Failing row contains (..., PENDING_VERIFICATION, ...) ```
## Nguyên nhân Có sự **không khớp giữa database constraint và Java enum**:
### Database (V1__init_schema.sql) - CHỈ cho phép 4 giá trị: ```sql CONSTRAINT chk_status CHECK (status IN ('PENDING_APPROVAL', 'ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE', 'REJECTED')) ```
### Java enum (UserStatus.java) - Có 6 giá trị: ```java public enum UserStatus { PENDING_APPROVAL, REJECTED, PENDING_VERIFICATION, // ❌ Không có trong DB constraint ACTIVE, INACTIVE, BANNED // ❌ Không có trong DB constraint } ```
Khi admin phê duyệt đơn đăng ký, hệ thống set `status = PENDING_VERIFICATION`, nhưng database không chấp nhận giá trị này → **Lỗi constraint violation!**
## ✅ Giải pháp đã áp dụng
### Bước 1: Tạo migration V2 Đã tạo file `V2__update_user_status_constraint.sql` để cập nhật constraint:
```sql -- Xóa constraint cũ ALTER TABLE users DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS chk_status;
-- Thêm constraint mới với đầy đủ 6 giá trị ALTER TABLE users ADD CONSTRAINT chk_status CHECK (status IN ('PENDING_APPROVAL', 'REJECTED', 'PENDING_VERIFICATION', 'ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE', 'BANNED')); ```
### Bước 2: Rebuild service ```bash cd auth-user mvn clean compile ```
✅ File migration V2 đã được copy vào `target/classes/db/migration/`
### Bước 3: Restart service để Flyway chạy migration Khi restart, Flyway sẽ: 1. Phát hiện migration mới `V2__update_user_status_constraint.sql` 2. Tự động chạy migration này 3. Cập nhật constraint trong database 4. Ghi log vào bảng `flyway_schema_history`
## Cách restart service
### Option 1: Restart từ IDE - Stop service hiện tại (Ctrl+C) - Run lại: `mvn spring-boot:run`
### Option 2: Restart bằng script ```bash .\run-dev.bat ```
### Option 3: Restart bằng Maven ```bash cd D:\Code\SpringBoot3\EV_Battery_SwapStation_MS\BE_EVBSSMS\auth-user mvn spring-boot:run ```
## Kiểm tra sau khi restart
### 1. Kiểm tra log Flyway Khi service khởi động, bạn sẽ thấy log: ``` INFO [o.f.c.i.s.JdbcTableSchemaHistory] - Creating Schema History table "public"."flyway_schema_history" ... INFO [o.f.core.internal.command.DbMigrate] - Migrating schema "public" to version "2 - update user status constraint" INFO [o.f.core.internal.command.DbMigrate] - Successfully applied 1 migration to schema "public" (execution time 00:00.123s) ```
### 2. Kiểm tra database Kết nối vào PostgreSQL và chạy: ```sql -- Kiểm tra constraint mới SELECT conname, pg_get_constraintdef(oid) FROM pg_constraint WHERE conname = 'chk_status';
-- Kết quả mong đợi: -- chk_status | CHECK (status::text = ANY (ARRAY['PENDING_APPROVAL'::character varying, 'REJECTED'::character varying, 'PENDING_VERIFICATION'::character varying, 'ACTIVE'::character varying, 'INACTIVE'::character varying, 'BANNED'::character varying]::text[]))
-- Kiểm tra lịch sử migration SELECT * FROM flyway_schema_history ORDER BY installed_rank;
-- Kết quả mong đợi: -- installed_rank | version | description | type | script | success -- ---------------+---------+----------------------------------+------+--------------------------------------------+--------- -- 1 | 1 | init schema | SQL | V1__init_schema.sql | t -- 2 | 2 | update user status constraint | SQL | V2__update_user_status_constraint.sql | t ```
### 3. Test lại luồng đăng ký → phê duyệt ```bash # 1. Đăng ký tài khoản mới POST /api/auth/oauth2/google/register → status = PENDING_APPROVAL ✅
# 2. Admin phê duyệt POST /api/admin/approve-registration → status = PENDING_VERIFICATION ✅ (Không còn lỗi constraint!)
# 3. User verify OTP POST /api/auth/verify-otp → status = ACTIVE ✅ ```
## Troubleshooting
### ❌ Lỗi: "Flyway failed to initialize" **Nguyên nhân:** Database connection bị lỗi hoặc schema không tồn tại.
**Giải pháp:** ```bash # Kiểm tra database đã chạy chưa docker ps | grep postgres
# Nếu chưa chạy docker start auth-user-db ```
### ❌ Lỗi: "Migration checksum mismatch" **Nguyên nhân:** File migration V1 đã bị thay đổi sau khi đã chạy.
**Giải pháp:** ```sql -- Xóa lịch sử migration cũ (CHỈ dùng trong development!) DELETE FROM flyway_schema_history WHERE version = '2';
-- Sau đó restart service ```
### ❌ Vẫn còn lỗi constraint sau khi restart **Nguyên nhân:** Migration chưa được chạy hoặc bị lỗi.
**Giải pháp:** ```bash # 1. Kiểm tra log docker logs -f auth-user-service
# 2. Kiểm tra Flyway history SELECT * FROM flyway_schema_history;
# 3. Nếu migration V2 chưa có, chạy thủ công: psql -U ev -d authdb -f src/main/resources/db/migration/V2__update_user_status_constraint.sql ```
## Tài liệu tham khảo
- [Flyway Documentation](https://flywaydb.org/documentation/) - [PostgreSQL CHECK Constraint](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/ddl-constraints.html#DDL-CONSTRAINTS-CHECK-CONSTRAINTS) - [Spring Boot Flyway Integration](https://docs.spring.io/spring-boot/docs/current/reference/html/howto.html#howto.data-initialization.migration-tool.flyway)
## Lưu ý quan trọng
1. **Không sửa migration đã chạy**: Migration V1 đã được apply, không nên sửa file này nữa 2. **Luôn tạo migration mới**: Khi cần thay đổi schema, tạo migration mới (V2, V3, ...) 3. **Kiểm tra enum và constraint**: Đảm bảo Java enum và database constraint luôn khớp nhau 4. **Test sau mỗi migration**: Luôn test lại các luồng nghiệp vụ sau khi chạy migration mới

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Hướng dẫn sử dụng MailHog để test email
## Mục đích MailHog là một SMTP server dùng để test email trong môi trường development. Tất cả email được gửi từ ứng dụng sẽ bị "chặn" bởi MailHog thay vì gửi đến địa chỉ email thật.
## ✅ Cấu hình đã được thiết lập
### 1. File `application.yml` ```yaml mail: host: ${MAIL_HOST:localhost} port: ${MAIL_PORT:1025} username: ${MAIL_USERNAME:} password: ${MAIL_PASSWORD:} properties: mail: smtp: auth: ${MAIL_SMTP_AUTH:false} starttls: enable: ${MAIL_SMTP_STARTTLS:false} required: ${MAIL_SMTP_STARTTLS:false} ```
### 2. File `.env` ```bash MAIL_HOST=localhost MAIL_PORT=1025 MAIL_USERNAME= MAIL_PASSWORD= MAIL_FROM=noreply@evbss.com MAIL_SMTP_AUTH=false MAIL_SMTP_STARTTLS=false ```
## Cách sử dụng
### 1️⃣ Khởi động MailHog (đã chạy rồi) ```bash # Kiểm tra MailHog đã chạy chưa docker ps | grep mailhog
# Nếu chưa chạy, start MailHog docker start base-mailhog ```
### 2️⃣ Truy cập MailHog Web UI Mở browser và truy cập: **http://localhost:8025**
Bạn sẽ thấy giao diện như sau: - **Inbox**: Danh sách email đã nhận - **Search**: Tìm kiếm email - **Delete**: Xóa email
### 3️⃣ Test gửi email OTP
#### Bước 1: Đăng ký tài khoản mới ```bash POST http://localhost:8080/api/auth/oauth2/google/register Content-Type: application/json
{ "idToken": "eyJhbGc...", "phone": "+84987654321", "birthday": "1990-01-15", "role": "DRIVER", "address": "123 Đường ABC, Quận 1, TP.HCM", "identityCard": "123456789012", "vehicles": [ { "vin": "VIN123456789", "model": "VF 8", "licensePlate": "51A-12345", "batteryType": "Lithium-ion", "batteryCapacity": 87.7 } ] } ```
**Response:** ```json { "statusCode": 201, "message": "Đăng ký thành công! Đơn của bạn đang chờ Admin phê duyệt. Bạn sẽ nhận được email khi đơn được duyệt.", "user": { ... } } ```
**Email 1 được gửi:** "Đơn đăng ký của bạn đang được xử lý"
#### Bước 2: Admin phê duyệt đơn đăng ký ```bash POST http://localhost:8080/api/admin/approve-registration Authorization: Bearer <ADMIN_JWT_TOKEN> Content-Type: application/json
{ "userId": 1, "approved": true } ```
**Response:** ```json { "statusCode": 200, "message": "Đã phê duyệt đơn đăng ký thành công. OTP đã được gửi đến email của người dùng." } ```
**Email 2 được gửi:** 1. Email thông báo được chấp nhận 2. Email chứa mã OTP (6 chữ số)
#### Bước 3: Kiểm tra email trong MailHog 1. Mở **http://localhost:8025** 2. Bạn sẽ thấy 2 email mới: - **Email 1**: "Đơn đăng ký của bạn đang được xử lý" - **Email 2**: "Đơn đăng ký được chấp nhận" - **Email 3**: "Mã OTP xác thực tài khoản" (ví dụ: `123456`)
#### Bước 4: Verify OTP ```bash POST http://localhost:8080/api/auth/verify-otp Content-Type: application/json
{ "email": "user@example.com", "otpCode": "123456" } ```
**Response:** ```json { "statusCode": 200, "message": "Xác thực OTP thành công!", "accessToken": "eyJhbGc...", "refreshToken": "eyJhbGc...", "user": { ... } } ```
## Các loại email được gửi trong hệ thống
| Sự kiện | Tiêu đề email | Thời điểm | |---------|---------------|-----------| | Đăng ký tài khoản | "Đơn đăng ký của bạn đang được xử lý" | Ngay sau khi đăng ký | | Admin chấp nhận | "Đơn đăng ký được chấp nhận" | Khi admin approve | | Gửi OTP | "Mã OTP xác thực tài khoản" | Khi admin approve | | Admin từ chối | "Đơn đăng ký bị từ chối" | Khi admin reject | | Tài khoản đã active | "Chào mừng đến với EV Battery Swap Station" | Sau khi verify OTP thành công |
## Troubleshooting
### ❌ Lỗi: "STARTTLS is required but host does not support STARTTLS" **Nguyên nhân:** Cấu hình email đang yêu cầu STARTTLS nhưng MailHog không hỗ trợ.
**Giải pháp:** Đã được sửa trong `application.yml`: ```yaml starttls: enable: false required: false ```
### ❌ Lỗi: "Connection refused" khi gửi email **Nguyên nhân:** MailHog chưa chạy hoặc port bị chiếm.
**Giải pháp:** ```bash # Kiểm tra MailHog đã chạy chưa docker ps | grep mailhog
# Restart MailHog docker restart base-mailhog
# Kiểm tra log docker logs base-mailhog ```
### ❌ Không thấy email trong MailHog **Nguyên nhân:** 1. Kafka chưa chạy 2. Consumer chưa lắng nghe 3. Cấu hình email sai
**Giải pháp:** ```bash # 1. Kiểm tra Kafka docker ps | grep kafka
# 2. Kiểm tra log của auth-user service docker logs -f auth-user-service
# Tìm dòng log: # ✅ "Đã tạo và gửi OTP cho user: xxx@gmail.com" # ✅ "Đã gửi email event lên Kafka: xxx@gmail.com" # ✅ "Đã gửi email thành công đến: xxx@gmail.com" ```
## Giao diện MailHog
Khi truy cập **http://localhost:8025**, bạn sẽ thấy:
``` ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ MailHog │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ Messages (3) │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ From: noreply@evbss.com │ │ │ │ To: user@example.com │ │ │ │ Subject: Mã OTP xác thực tài khoản │ │ │ │ Time: 2025-10-11 10:30:00 │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ From: noreply@evbss.com │ │ │ │ To: user@example.com │ │ │ │ Subject: Đơn đăng ký được chấp nhận │ │ │ │ Time: 2025-10-11 10:29:50 │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────┘ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────┘ ```
## Lưu ý quan trọng
1. **MailHog chỉ dùng cho Development**: Không dùng MailHog trong Production 2. **Email không được gửi ra ngoài**: Tất cả email đều bị chặn bởi MailHog 3. **Không cần username/password**: MailHog không yêu cầu xác thực SMTP 4. **Email được giữ trong memory**: Restart MailHog sẽ mất tất cả email 5. **Port 1025**: SMTP port của MailHog (khác với Gmail là 587) 6. **Port 8025**: Web UI của MailHog
## Tham khảo
- [MailHog Official GitHub](https://github.com/mailhog/MailHog) - [Spring Boot Mail Documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-boot/docs/current/reference/html/io.html#io.email) - [Kafka Documentation](https://kafka.apache.org/documentation/)

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
spring: application: name: billing-service datasource: url: jdbc:postgresql://${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_HOST:localhost}:${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_PORT:5436}/${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_NAME:billingdb} username: ${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_USER:ev} password: ${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_PASSWORD:evpass} driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver jpa: hibernate: ddl-auto: update show-sql: true properties: hibernate: format_sql: true dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect flyway: enabled: true baseline-on-migrate: true locations: classpath:db/migration/billing-payment url: jdbc:postgresql://${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_HOST:localhost}:${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_PORT:5436}/${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_NAME:billingdb} user: ${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_USER:ev} password: ${BILLING_PAYMENT_DB_PASSWORD:evpass} docker: compose: enabled: false eureka: client: serviceUrl: defaultZone: ${EUREKA_CLIENT_SERVICEURL_DEFAULTZONE:http://localhost:8761/eureka/} register-with-eureka: true fetch-registry: true instance: prefer-ip-address: true
server: port: 8084 forward-headers-strategy: framework tomcat: remoteip: remote-ip-header: X-Forwarded-For protocol-header: X-Forwarded-Proto
# Springdoc OpenAPI (Swagger) Configuration springdoc: api-docs: path: /v3/api-docs enabled: true groups: enabled: true swagger-ui: path: /swagger-ui.html enabled: true operations-sorter: method tags-sorter: alpha doc-expansion: none urls: - name: "Billing Service (Direct)" url: "/v3/api-docs" - name: "Billing Service (Via Gateway)" url: "http://localhost:8080/billing/v3/api-docs" show-actuator: false
logging: level: org.springframework: INFO com.boilerplate.code: DEBUG org.flywaydb: DEBUG

networks: evnet: driver: bridge

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.5.6</version> <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> </parent> <groupId>com.boilerplate</groupId> <artifactId>code</artifactId> <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <name>code</name> <description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description> <url/> <licenses> <license/> </licenses> <developers> <developer/> </developers> <scm> <connection/> <developerConnection/> <tag/> <url/> </scm> <properties> <java.version>21</java.version> </properties> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId> </dependency> <!-- Validation --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Actuator --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springdoc/springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId> <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifactId> <version>2.8.13</version> </dependency>
<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.flywaydb/flyway-core --> <dependency> <groupId>org.flywaydb</groupId> <artifactId>flyway-core</artifactId> <version>11.10.0</version> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.flywaydb</groupId> <artifactId>flyway-database-postgresql</artifactId> <version>11.10.0</version> </dependency>
<!-- Resource Server cho JWT --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Test --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <!-- Testcontainers (tùy chọn) --> <!-- <dependency> <groupId>org.testcontainers</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> -->
<!-- Configuration metadata (IDE hints) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-configuration-processor</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-security</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-docker-compose</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.security</groupId> <artifactId>spring-security-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <annotationProcessorPaths> <path> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </path> </annotationProcessorPaths> </configuration> </plugin> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <excludes> <exclude> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.4.1</version> <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> </parent> <groupId>com.boilerplate</groupId> <artifactId>code</artifactId> <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <name>code</name> <description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description> <url/> <licenses> <license/> </licenses> <developers> <developer/> </developers> <scm> <connection/> <developerConnection/> <tag/> <url/> </scm> <properties> <java.version>21</java.version> </properties> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId> </dependency> <!-- Validation --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Actuator --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springdoc/springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId> <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifactId> <version>2.8.13</version> </dependency>
<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.flywaydb/flyway-core --> <dependency> <groupId>org.flywaydb</groupId> <artifactId>flyway-core</artifactId> <version>11.10.0</version> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.flywaydb</groupId> <artifactId>flyway-database-postgresql</artifactId> <version>11.10.0</version> </dependency>
<!-- Resource Server cho JWT --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Test --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <!-- Testcontainers (tùy chọn) --> <!-- <dependency> <groupId>org.testcontainers</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> -->
<!-- Configuration metadata (IDE hints) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-configuration-processor</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-security</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-docker-compose</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.security</groupId> <artifactId>spring-security-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <annotationProcessorPaths> <path> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </path> </annotationProcessorPaths> </configuration> </plugin> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <excludes> <exclude> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: FROM eclipse-temurin:21-jre WORKDIR /app COPY ./target/code-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar app.jar EXPOSE 8080 ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","/app/app.jar"]

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.5.6</version> <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> </parent> <groupId>com.boilerplate</groupId> <artifactId>code</artifactId> <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <name>code</name> <description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description> <url/> <licenses> <license/> </licenses> <developers> <developer/> </developers> <scm> <connection/> <developerConnection/> <tag/> <url/> </scm> <properties> <java.version>21</java.version> </properties> <dependencies> <!-- Validation --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Actuator --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springdoc/springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId> <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifactId> <version>2.8.13</version> </dependency>
<!-- Resource Server cho JWT --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Test --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <!-- Testcontainers (tùy chọn) --> <!-- <dependency> <groupId>org.testcontainers</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> -->
<!-- Configuration metadata (IDE hints) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-configuration-processor</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-security</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-docker-compose</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-docker-compose</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.security</groupId> <artifactId>spring-security-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <annotationProcessorPaths> <path> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </path> </annotationProcessorPaths> </configuration> </plugin> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <excludes> <exclude> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.4.1</version> <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> </parent> <groupId>com.boilerplate</groupId> <artifactId>code</artifactId> <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <name>code</name> <description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description> <url/> <licenses> <license/> </licenses> <developers> <developer/> </developers> <scm> <connection/> <developerConnection/> <tag/> <url/> </scm> <properties> <java.version>21</java.version> </properties> <dependencies> <!-- Validation --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Actuator --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springdoc/springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId> <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifactId> <version>2.8.13</version> </dependency>
<!-- Resource Server cho JWT --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Test --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <!-- Testcontainers (tùy chọn) --> <!-- <dependency> <groupId>org.testcontainers</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> -->
<!-- Configuration metadata (IDE hints) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-configuration-processor</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-security</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.security</groupId> <artifactId>spring-security-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <annotationProcessorPaths> <path> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </path> </annotationProcessorPaths> </configuration> </plugin> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <excludes> <exclude> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
spring.application.name=notification-service
# Server port server.port=8085
# Database Configuration spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/ev_battery_swapstation_ms_notification_db?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true&useSSL=false&serverTimezone=UTC spring.datasource.username=root spring.datasource.password= spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
# JPA/Hibernate spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update spring.jpa.show-sql=true spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql=true spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.dialect=org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL8Dialect
# Eureka Client Configuration eureka.client.service-url.defaultZone=http://localhost:8761/eureka/ eureka.client.register-with-eureka=true eureka.client.fetch-registry=true eureka.instance.prefer-ip-address=true
# Actuator management.endpoints.web.exposure.include=* management.endpoint.health.show-details=always
# Logging logging.level.com.notification=DEBUG logging.level.org.springframework.web=INFO logging.level.org.hibernate=ERROR
